name: What We Left Behind (VenBright)
description:
Take the role of a scholar exploring the ruins of a long forgotten
civilization. Something seems awry, something seems a little off; who
knows What Was Left Behind?

WASD - Move

P - Pause

Mouse - Throw Items

A Spud Buds Game for the GDN Cherry Jam 2017

Your Spud Buds, hand picked from the earth, are:

Art: Kimberlea Heili

Music: Monish Corona

Design & VO: Ven Bright

Programming: Marcello Hunt
